document.full_text: the u.s. economy is on a firmer footing after a deep and lengthy recession, but still-high unemployment is keeping inflation under wraps and continues to warrant ongoing support from the federal reserve's ultra-easy money policy, a top fed official said on thursday.
document.title: fed's evans says no need to alter easy money policy yet
lines_and_colors: the u.s. economy is on a firmer footing after a deep and lengthy recession, but still-high unemployment is keeping inflation under wraps and continues to warrant ongoing support from the federal reserve's ultra-easy money policy, a top fed official said on thursday.
